description:
Tree works at front and rear within Abbotts Close subject to TPO Islington No.5 1976. 

 Works:  Refer to plan dated 18th March 2002 and submitted by         Antony M Wyland. 

         T41 (2) Sycamore:}         T40 (3) Sycamore:} Crown thin         T39 (4) Sycamore:} by 40%         T38 (5) Sycamore:}         T35 (6) Ailanthus: Crown thin by 30%         T19 (7) Sycamore:  Crown thin by 40%         T24 (8) Sycamore:  Crown lift and thin by 30%         T25 (9) Sycamore:  Crown thin by 30%         T21 (10) Lime:     Crown lift to second floor level.                            Reduce back to clear building.         T18 (11) Lime:     Crown thin, remove epicormic                            growth.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: All the tree work is to be carried out by a competent Tree Surgeon to the recommendation of BS3998: 1989 'Tree Work'. 

 REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
